description: The Monkey King, Sun Wukong accidentally boarded a pirate ship, led by Captain Pigsy, who has intentions to conquer newly discovered lands. On the same pirate ship, there are also two more passengers; Slave Sandy and the mysterious Ghost Tang. Throughout their voyage, they kept encountering the Skull Mermaid, who kept pursuing Wukong as she has never tasted monkey meat before.
name: Monkey King: Pirates
